EmailTemplate.name: RE: Tri Tech Contract contact (1342190995.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Tri Tech Contract contact (1342190995.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Brad , Nice to meet you via email. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses <http://www.mbopartners.com/#howwehelp> who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. The following links provide our standard agreement <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf> and statement of work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Karl Bradshaw [mailto:kbradshaw2@carolina.rr.com] Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2012 9:44 PM To: brad@tritechlabs.com; Sara Conde Subject: Tri Tech Contract contact Hey Brad, meet Sara. She’s my MBO Partners business manager and she’ll be working with me to get all my clients set up. Sara, meet Brad Hill. He’ll be the one who signs all the contracts. His phone number is: 434-485-8277. Please let me know if you have any questions, etc. Thanks and I look forward to a long mutual relationship. Karl Bradshawe-mail: kbradshaw@coralparkgroup.com <mailto:kbradshaw@coralparkgroup.com>Work: (704) 243-2963Cell: (704) 577-0950 The often ignored crazy old guy in the corner who mutters to himself in riddles of logic while drawing arcane symbols on a glowing tablet – thus weaving the spells of technology.
